wikipedia_page.main: Gareth Greenall, better known by his stage name Audio, is a British DJ and producer from Redhill, UK. Currently signed to RAM Records and his own label Snake Pit Records, he has released four albums on Virus Recordings. Greenall is also part of the record production group Pixel Fist.

response: Audio most commonly refers to sound, as it is transmitted in signal form. It may also refer to:
*Audio signal, an electrical representation of sound
*Audio frequency, a frequency in the audio spectrum
*Audio, audible content (media) in audio production and publishing
*Audio (album), an album by the Blue Man Group

link_mentions.page: List of jungle and drum and bass artists

response: Unofficial remixes of the song by a number of high-profile artists in the drum and bass scene have emerged since the song's release. TC and Koncept, as well as RAM Records artists LoKo and Audio have all created bootlegs of the song. These have received airplay on BBC Radio 1, 1Xtra and Rinse FM.
